channel.title: Portals and spawn things help
channel.description:
first question: How i add more of 1 portal? (obs i don't have the case of the portals post the case 2gether)
second: wher ei spawn doors etc... i spawn at globalobjects and don't worked :D
rep++ if help =)

item.title: Portals and spawn things help
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

to get the portals case search like the case and id

example:

case 4499:

(this is what’s in my case tho)
if (objectX == 2797 && objectY == 3614)
{
sendMessage(“You crawl through the cave”);
teleportToX = 2772;
teleportToY = 10231;
}
break;

For the first part look for this in client.java.

AddGlobalObject

Read full topic
